attributes.action: force banks to cut the amount of time taken to clear cheques
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: banks on average currently take 5 working days to clear cheques into your bank account from the day of paying the cheque in.... even cheques which have been drawn from a building society on a cheque which is a cleared item still takes the same amount of time to clear. lets stop the banks making interest off the backs of these cheques and ensure cheques get paid interest from day one and clear in no longer than 2 working days.as all banks are linked through various systems this should not be too difficult
